title: CCleaner Professional Plus v4.12.4657 + Keymaker-CORE
description:
================
 [INFO:]
================


CCleaner Professional Plus v4.12.4657 + Keymaker-CORE | 13.7 MB



At Piriform we create award-winning software to make your computer faster, more secure and have greater privacy. Whether you're cleaning out files on your system with CCleaner, defragging your hard drive with Defraggler, analyzing your hardware with Speccy, or recovering deleted files with Recuva, we've got you covered. 


CCleaner Professional Plus contains:

CCleaner
CCleaner is the number-one tool for cleaning your Windows PC. It protects your privacy online and makes your computer faster and more secure. Easy to use and a small, fast download.

Defraggler
Use Defraggler to defrag your entire hard drive, or individual files - unique in the industry. This compact and portable Windows application supports NTFS and FAT32 file systems.

Recuva
Accidentally deleted an important file? Lost something important when your computer crashed? No problem! Recuva recovers files deleted from your Windows computer, Recycle Bin, digital camera card, or MP3 player.

Speccy
Speccy is an advanced System Information tool for your PC. Need to find out what's inside your computer? No problem! Speccy will give you all the information you need.



Platform : Windows XP/Vista/Windows 7/Windows 8/Windows 8.1
Language : Multilanguage
 
 

================
[INSTALL NOTES]
================

1. Disconnect NET! (important!!!)
2. Install ccleaner professional plus(= package contain:ccleaner,recuva,defraggler and Speccy)
3. Run Keymaker CORE,select program you want to register and generate a serial for this.
4  Then open piriform program and register it with generated serial
5. Repeat step number 4 and 5 for each piriform program that you want register.
6. Re-open NET
7. Done
8. Enjoy!


NOTE: Keygens, patches, Activators, Cracks, Loaders etc. are always scanned with
      Kaspersky Internet Security 2014 Latest Version to Avoid Virus 
      issues.
